ModMetaData.name: Wood Is Natural (For Trees)
ModMetaData.author: Sokyran, Hush
ModMetaData.description:
Do you like my mods? You can support me on Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/sokyran
This mod makes Anima/Gauranlan/Polux trees, as well as nature shrines, consider any structure made out of wood as natural. Supported material types can be configured.
This only works with stuffable things (the ones where you can pick material for).
